general.gigTitle: develop design or redesign showit squarespace or  tilda website

sellerCard.description:
I am a professional Web and Cloud Developer(AWS). I am skilled in developing full-stack websites from scratch, API's development and deployment on AWS & heroku.

Skills: Node js, Expressjs, MongoDB, AWS, Heroku, HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

description.content:
IMPORTANT: PLEASE, CONTACT ME FIRST BEFORE YOU ORDER A GIG!

TILDA | SHOWIT | SQUARESPACE

ï»¿

Hello,

If youre on the hunt for a professional Tilda, Showit or Squarespace Website Developer with extensive experience, youre in the right place. I specialize in the designing, creating and implementing of innovative web / mobile interactive applications with layouts that deliver improved functionality and user experience in a very well structured code. I have extensive knowledge with Website Design, always in touch with trends of modern and usable web solutions and approaches. I provide exceptional design and coding services and help my clients create elegant and effective digital platforms.


My Services are:

Fully Responsive Tilda, Showit or Squarespace website design(Mobile and Desktop view)

Fully Customizable layout

Best colors and font combination

Online booking system

E-commerce functionality

Products upload

Online store

Payment gateway integration

Icon adding

Newsletter and contact forms

SEO Optimiz

Podcast Setup

Custom code(HTML, CSS, jQuery


Don't see what you are looking for or have a special feature? Kindly inbox me.

Thank you.

reviews.comment: Karl is well reviewed on Fiverr because he is exceptional at what he does. I wouldn't hesitate to use him again and I will share his contact info with anyone who likes my site or needs a web designer.
Amazing work and modified as needed with zero complaining about the modifications. He hit this project out of the park and I will be back for more in the future. Such a great job, highly recommend!!!
He was able to provide a website that met our expectations, and also educated me on how to update the site in the future
